data.text: Winji gima Jehova Nyasaye wachoni, yaye od Israel.
Ma e gima Jehova Nyasaye wacho:
Nimar kit jogi kod timbegi onge tiende;
Giwire gi fedha gi dhahabu;
Mana kaka gima ibwogogo gik moko e puothe mag budho,
Onge ngʼama chalo kodi, yaye Jehova Nyasaye;
En ngʼa ma ok onego miyi luor,
Giduto gionge paro kendo gifuwo;
Fedha mothedhi ikelo koa Tarshish
To Jehova Nyasaye e Nyasaye madieri;
“Nyisgi ma: ‘Nyiseche manonogi, mane ok ochweyo polo gi piny, nolal nono e piny kendo e bwo polo.’ ”
To Nyasaye nochweyo piny gi tekone;
Ka omor ka polo, to pige manie polo wuo;
Ji duto parogi ok ti
Gionge tich, gin gik minyiero;
Jalno ma en Pok mar Jakobo ok chal kodgi,
Chokuru giu duto mondo ua e pinyno,
Nimar ma e gima Jehova Nyasaye wacho:
To mano kaka litna nikech hinyruok mara!
Hemba okethi; tonde mitweyego duto ochodi.
Jokwath onge rieko to
Chik iti! Wach biro niya,
Angʼeyo, yaye Jehova Nyasaye,
Rieya, Jehova Nyasaye, to mana gi bura
Ol mirimbi kuom
